location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'CHART OF "HAQIQAH CHANNEL" SHOWING DEPTH OF WATER IN FEET. FOR THE AID OF "RIVER NAVIGATORS" & OTHERS. August 28th 1915. Compass Sketch Only.'

mods.abstract: The map shows the Haqiqah Channel and also indicates hydrology and settlements, with brief descriptions of topography and vegetation, and provides some indication of relief. A short note describes how the land is inundated from January to May and a further note describes the channels further and the availability of good water and fodder.The map bears the printing statement: 'Intelligence Branch General Staff I.E.F. "D" 19.19.15. Map Serial NO.66.'
